name: google-sheets-mcp
description: Google Sheets MCP Server with OAuth authentication
setup_instructions: 1. Ensure you have the following files in the project directory:
2. Make sure token.json has proper permissions (600)
3. The server will automatically handle OAuth authentication
4. If authentication fails, run: npm run oauth:setup

troubleshooting.file_not_found: Check that token.json and google-oauth-key.json exist in the project directory
troubleshooting.oauth_expired: Run: npm run oauth:setup to refresh tokens
troubleshooting.working_directory: Ensure the MCP server runs from the project root directory
